snippet: The Internet shopping case concerned Colorado’s attempt to collect sales taxes on out-of-state purchases.
abstract: Supreme Court hears cases about Internet shopping and railroads; shopping case involves Colorado's effort to collect sales taxes on out-of-state purchases; railroad case concerns challenge by trade group over law it says gives Amtrak too much power over freight railroad firms.
lead_paragraph: The Internet shopping case concerned Colorado’s attempt to collect sales taxes on out-of-state purchases.

headline.main: Supreme Court Hears Cases on Internet Shopping and Railroads
headline.print_headline: Justices Hear Internet Shopping and Railroad Cases
